messages.title: Karen's Action Plan for North Norfolk

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plan to ensure developers deliver affordable homes in North Norfolk for local people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle The Climate Emergency Head On
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Karen will address the issues from lack of access to charging points for electric vehicles to pushing for North Norfolk's offshore wind potential at Westminster.
She supports making it easier to see a GP and will fight to stop education funding cuts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Karen will stand up and fight for our shared values.

issues.education: Will fight to stop education funding cuts.
issues.environment: Will address the lack of access to charging points for electric vehicles and push for North Norfolk's offshore wind potential.
issues.health: Supports making it easier to see a GP.

housing.content: Plan to ensure developers deliver affordable homes in North Norfolk for local people.

leaflet.personalStatement: But Karen can't do it alone. She needs your help.

images.caption: Karen Ward - The strong local voice North Norfolk needs.
